catalog_script_client.name: Assign selected books

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_69bdd95197e211103e1f7cb0f053af21
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Borrow Books">7b79aed0976611103e1f7cb0f053af1e</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Assign selected books</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var books=g_form.getValue('selected_books');
	var titles=books.split(',');
	var listed_titles=[];
	for(var i=0; i<titles.length;i++){
		var getBorrowedBooks = new GlideAjax('GetBorrowedBooks');
		getBorrowedBooks.addParam('sysparm_name','getBooks');
		getBorrowedBooks.addParam('sysparm_sys_id', titles[i]);
		getBorrowedBooks.getXML(populateListField);
		
		function populateListField(response){
			var extractedBook = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
			listed_titles.push(extractedBook);
			g_form.clearValue('borrowed_book');
			g_form.setValue('borrowed_book',listed_titles.join(', '));
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-14 02:39:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>69bdd95197e211103e1f7cb0f053af21</sys_id><sys_mod_count>55</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Assign selected books</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Library Management System" source="x_898711_library_m">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Library Management System">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_69bdd95197e211103e1f7cb0f053af21</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-27 05:55:53</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
